General.Name: Daewon Sanup Co. Ltd
General.Description: Daewon Sanup Co., Ltd manufactures and sells seats in South Korea, China, Russia, and internationally. It provides products under the Grand Carnival, Pride, Forte, Sorrento, and Morning names. The company was formerly known as Daewon Seat Industries Co., Ltd. to Daewon Sanup Co., Ltd in March 1990. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Ansan-si, South Korea.

2.Name: Jae-Myeong  Hur
2.Title: Sr. Managing Director and Representative Director
